docs: table bills: bill_id, user_id, meter_id, billing_month, total_consumption, total_amount, due_date, payment_status, paid_date, created_at
table electricity_prices: price_id, user_type, tier_level, min_consumption, max_consumption, unit_price, effective_date, is_current
table electricity_records: record_id, meter_id, reading_date, current_reading, previous_reading, consumption, peak_consumption, valley_consumption, record_status, recorded_by, created_at
table meters: meter_id, user_id, meter_number, meter_type, capacity, installation_date, status
table payment_records: payment_id, bill_id, user_id, payment_amount, payment_method, payment_date, transaction_id, status
table users: user_id, username, password, real_name, phone, email, address, user_type, created_at
